entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, asked a question to Ron.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Sat down in a chair with her arms and legs crossed.

entities.name: snatchers
entities.description: A gang of people trying to earn gold by rounding up Muggleborns and blood traitors.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: Offered a reward for everyone captured.

entities.name: stan shunpike
entities.description: A person Ron pretended to be to get out of being dragged to the Ministry.

entities.name: blood traitors
entities.description: People who are not pure-blood wizards.

relationships.description: Ron told Harry about his encounter with the snatchers.
Harry asked Hermione a question, but she didn't respond.
Ron pretended to be Stan Shunpike to get out of being dragged to the Ministry.
